title: Promare
occurrences: If he hurts the Burnish with the Prometech engine, the Promare in the Earth's core will go berserk.
Thirty years ago, there was a distortion of space and time that connected Earth's core to the Promare Universe.
Humans prone to resonate with the Promare can use their power.
Using the Promare's interdimensional energy, teleportation is indeed possible.
But, the Burnish's nerve signals reach the Promare they're synched with.
The Promare feel the Burnish's pain.
--the Promare in Earth's core will spiral out of control, destroying the planet.
The super weapon I've created in the event of Promare disaster.
It uses Lio's body as a gateway to harness Promare energy.
--created for protection from Promare attacks and solar flares on the new planet!
The Burnish are controlled by the Promare!
Inside the pod, I synched with the Promare in the core and now I know.
Yes. The Promare synch with the humans' will.
We satisfied the Promare's primal drive to burn--
There are no Promare nor Burnish in this world anymore.
